841x
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
1x
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
const options = {
	itemsVisible: 5,
	classNameHidden: 'm-list-keyvalue__row-hidden js-m-list-keyvalue__row-hidden',
	classNameVisible: 'js-m-list-keyvalue__row-visible',
	classNameVisibleLast: 'm-list-keyvalue__row-visible-last js-m-list-keyvalue__row-visible-last',
	readMoreLabelButtonDefault: 'Read More',
	readLessLabelButtonDefault: 'Read Less',
	newItemLink: '<button class="m-list-keyvalue__button-more">Read More</button>',
	svgPlus: '<svg class="mat-icon mat-icon--small mat-icon--stroked"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#plus"></use></svg>',
	svgMinus: '<svg class="mat-icon mat-icon--small mat-icon--stroked"><use xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" xlink:href="#minus"></use></svg>',
 
};
 
const selectors = {
	items: '.js-m-list-keyvalue__row-col',
	hiddenItems: '.js-m-list-keyvalue__row-hidden',
};
 
class ListKeyValue {
	constructor($el) {
		this.$el = $el;
		this.itemsVisible = $el.attr('data-readmore-visible') || options.itemsVisible;
		this.$items = $el.find(selectors.items);
		if (typeof $el.attr('data-readmore') !== typeof undefined && $el.attr('data-readmore') !== false) {
			this.hideItems();
			this.addCustomLastRow();
		}
	}
 
	hideItems() {
		this.$items.filter((count, item) => {
			const $item = $(item);
			if (count < this.itemsVisible) {
				$item.addClass(options.classNameVisible);
			} else {
				$item.addClass(options.classNameHidden);
			}
			return true;
		});
	}
 
	addCustomLastRow() {
		this.$newItem = this.$items.first().clone();
		this.$newItemLink = $(options.newItemLink);
		this.readMoreLabelButtonDefault = this.$el.attr('data-readmore-button-text-more') || options.readMoreLabelButtonDefault;
		this.readLessLabelButtonDefault = this.$el.attr('data-readless-button-text-less') || options.readLessLabelButtonDefault;
		this.$newItemLink.text(this.readMoreLabelButtonDefault);
		this.$newItemLink.append(options.svgPlus);
		this.$newItemLink.on('click', this.onNewButtonClickMore.bind(this));
		this.$newItem.html(this.$newItemLink);
		this.$newItem.addClass(options.classNameVisibleLast);
		this.$el.append(this.$newItem);
	}
 
	onNewButtonClickMore() {
		this.showItems();
		this.changeLink();
	}
 
	onNewButtonClickLess() {
		this.hideItems();
		this.changeLink(true);
	}
 
	showItems() {
		this.$el.find(selectors.hiddenItems).removeClass(options.classNameHidden);
	}
 
	changeLink(isLess) {
		if (isLess) {
			this.$newItemLink.text(this.readMoreLabelButtonDefault);
			this.$newItemLink.append(options.svgPlus);
			this.$newItemLink.off('click').on('click', this.onNewButtonClickMore.bind(this));
		} else {
			this.$newItemLink.text(this.readLessLabelButtonDefault);
			this.$newItemLink.append(options.svgMinus);
			this.$newItemLink.off('click').on('click', this.onNewButtonClickLess.bind(this));
		}
	}
 
}
 
export default ListKeyValue;
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Tue Jun 20 2017 17:57:44 GMT+0200 (CEST)
